statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsultants;
SELECT consultant_id, consultant_name FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT consultant_name, expertise_area FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE expertise_area = 'Renewable Energy';
SELECT consultant_id, consultant_name, contact_number FROM EnergyConsultants ORDER BY consultant_name DESC;
SELECT consultant_name, experience_years FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE expertise_area = 'Renewable Energy' ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_id = 101;
SELECT consultant_name, expertise_area, contact_number FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY consultant_name;
SELECT consultant_name, contact_number FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE expertise_area LIKE '%Energy%' AND experience_years BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY consultant_name, experience_years;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_name LIKE 'A%' OR consultant_name LIKE '%y' ORDER BY consultant_name ASC, experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsultants;
SELECT consultant_name, consultant_specialization FROM EnergyConsultants;
SELECT consultant_name, consultant_specialization FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_id = 1;
SELECT consultant_name FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_specialization = 'Renewable Energy';
SELECT consultant_id, consultant_name FROM EnergyConsultants ORDER BY consultant_id DESC;
SELECT consultant_id, consultant_name, consultant_specialization FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_specialization = 'Renewable Energy' ORDER BY consultant_name DESC;
SELECT consultant_id, consultant_name FROM EnergyConsultants ORDER BY consultant_id ASC, consultant_name DESC;
SELECT consultant_id, consultant_specialization FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 AND consultant_specialization LIKE '%Solar%';
SELECT consultant_name, consultant_specialization FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_specialization != 'Wind Energy';
SELECT * FROM energy_consultants;
SELECT consultant_name, consultant_specialization FROM energy_consultants;
SELECT analysis_date, estimated_cost, estimated_savings FROM cost_benefit_analysis;
SELECT property_id, panel_capacity, panel_type, installation_date FROM solar_panels;
SELECT analysis_id, property_id, estimated_savings FROM cost_benefit_analysis;
SELECT * FROM energy_consultants ORDER BY consultant_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT consultant_name, consultant_specialization FROM energy_consultants WHERE consultant_specialization = 'Renewable Energy'
SELECT consultant_id, consultant_name FROM energy_consultants WHERE consultant_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY consultant_name
SELECT * FROM cost_benefit_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC, estimated_cost DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT analysis_id, property_id FROM cost_benefit_analysis WHERE estimated_savings > 1000
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT solar_panel_brand, installation_date FROM SolarPanels WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT consultant_name, consultant_specialty FROM EnergyConsultants ORDER BY consultant_name DESC;
SELECT property_id, total_cost, estimated_savings FROM CostBenefitAnalysis WHERE total_cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM ResidentialProperties WHERE property_size_sqft BETWEEN 1500 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT solar_panel_brand, installation_date FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY installation_date DESC;

SELECT SolarPanels.*, ResidentialProperties.property_address FROM SolarPanels JOIN ResidentialProperties ON SolarPanels.property_id = ResidentialProperties.property_id WHERE ResidentialProperties.property_size_sqft > 2000;

SELECT consultant_name, consultant_specialty, COUNT(*) AS total_panels FROM EnergyConsultants JOIN SolarPanels ON EnergyConsultants.consultant_id = SolarPanels.property_id GROUP BY consultant_name, consultant_specialty;
SELECT SUM(total_cost) AS total_costs, AVG(estimated_savings) AS avg_savings FROM CostBenefitAnalysis WHERE total_cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsultants;
SELECT consultant_id, name, email FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_id = 'd97b93b4-ff1d-4bdb-9f58-71f77b6cc3cd';
SELECT * FROM ResidentialProperties ORDER BY roof_area_m2 DESC;
SELECT panel_id, manufacturer, wattage, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT analysis_id, installation_cost_cents, annual_savings_cents FROM CostBenefitAnalysis WHERE annual_savings_cents > 5000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsultants;
SELECT consultant_id, name, email FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM EnergyConsultants WHERE consultant_id IN (SELECT consultant_id FROM Reports WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM CostBenefitAnalysis WHERE installation_cost_cents > 50000 ORDER BY annual_savings_cents DESC;

SELECT rp.address, sp.manufacturer, cba.annual_savings_cents FROM ResidentialProperties rp JOIN SolarPanels sp ON rp.property_id = sp.panel_id JOIN CostBenefitAnalysis cba ON rp.property_id = cba.property_id WHERE sp.wattage > 3000 AND cba.annual_savings_cents > 1000 ORDER BY cba.annual_savings_cents DESC LIMIT 5;
